sternberg_intro: Siradaki kisimda goreceginiz 6 resimleri aklinizda tutunuz.
Ardindan size bir ek gorev verilecektir.
Ek gorevi tamamladiktan sonra size tekrar bir resim belirecektir.
Bu gordugunuz resim, onceki gordugunuz resim listesi icinde
ise evete (F), degilse hayir (J) tusuna basin.
maze_intro: Arabanin garaji bulmasi icin yardim et.
Hareket etmek için ok/WSAD tuslarini kullanin.
Oyun baslayinca devamli bosluk tusuna bas.

sternberg_intro: Look at 6 icons and memorize them in the next part.
After that, you will get an additional task.
You have to complete this task under 30 seconds.
After you complete the additional task, an icon will appear again.
If this icon was in the 6 icon list, press yes (F), if it was not,
maze_intro: This car can not find its way to garage.
Help the car find the garage.
Use arrow/WSAD keys to move around.
Tap spacebar constantly once game starts.
